articles.author: Around The NFL staff
articles.title: Charges against Cardinals WR Christian Kirk dropped
articles.description: The charges against Arizona Cardinals rookie wide receiver Christian Kirk stemming from a February incident in Arizona have been dismissed by the Scottsdale City Attorney's Office.

articles.author: Herbie Teope
articles.title: NBA legend Kobe Bryant visits Patriots practice
articles.description: Former NBA superstar Kobe Bryant was present at the New England Patriots' training facility on Wednesday to greet the players as they returned to work, per ESPN.

articles.author: Around The NFL staff
articles.title: Damarious Randall: Jersey offer on Twitter was a joke
articles.description: Hey, everybody -- Damarious Randall didn't think you'd take his "you all get a jersey" Oprah moment seriously. The Cleveland Browns safety says his jersey offer was meant to be a joke.

articles.author: Marc Sessler
articles.title: Tre Boston making free-agent visit to Cardinals
articles.description: The Cardinals are in need of safety help. Enter Tre Boston, currently on an airplane zooming toward Arizona, according to NFL Network's Mike Garafolo.

articles.author: Chris Wesseling
articles.title: Allen Robinson (ACL) practices for first time with Bears
articles.description: Signed to a three-year, $42 million contract, wide receiver Allen Robinson is the centerpiece of the Bears' revamped offense. Until this week, though, teammates and coaches had yet to glimpse Robinson's potential.

articles.author: Chris Wesseling
articles.title: Teddy Bridgewater building trade value via OTAs?
articles.description: As Teddy Bridgewater continues down the comeback trail, an impressive showing during Jets organized team activities could eventually create a trade market for the veteran quarterback.

articles.author: Kevin Patra
articles.title: Ben Roethlisberger, Antonio Brown miss recent OTAs
articles.description: Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger and receiver Antonio Brown have missed the past four and three practices, respectively, Ed Bouchette of the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette reported.

articles.author: Herbie Teope
articles.title: Jared Cook, Raiders embracing Jon Gruden's message
articles.description: New Raiders head coach Jon Gruden has begun changing the culture in Oakland, and his approach has won over support from veterans such as tight end Jared Cook.

articles.author: Dan Hanzus
articles.title: Mailbag: Next NFL dynasty? Cowboy up, LeBron James!!
articles.description: Which franchise has the best chance to become the next NFL dynasty? How's Andrew Luck looking? Which NFL team has a perfect opening for LeBron James? Dan Hanzus answers those questions -- and more -- in his mailbag.

articles.author: Marc Sessler
articles.title: Roundup: Green Bay Packers sign OL Byron Bell
articles.description: The Packers bolstered Aaron Rodgers' protection with the addition of veteran offensive lineman Byron Bell, who previously played with the Cowboys, Titans and Panthers.
